room_title: Escape room "The Crime Scene" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: No complaints. Had a great time even though we weren't able to escape. Had 10 in the room and it wasn't crowded. Would definitely do it again. We did "crime scene".

room_title: Escape room "The Crime Scene" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: We did the Crime Scene room. Jake made a great introduction of the room. However, the escape was a bit challenging even with the help of our 3 clues. Even though we did not escape, our group had a great time. This is definitely a must do if you visit the Destin area!

room_title: Escape room "The Crime Scene" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: Wonderful experience! We worked really well with the other group we were in the Crime Scene room with. They were so quick and tried to bounce ideas off of us. We had over 8 minutes to spare when we escaped! Woohoo!

room_title: Escape room "The Crime Scene" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: We loved The Crime Room! Much more critical thinking involved than what we expected, which made it all the more enjoyable.

room_title: Escape room "The Crime Scene" by Escape Zone 60 in Destin
review: My three close friends and I went in there unprepared for the bombardment of clues and locked boxes. We barely managed to escape with about five seconds remaining, so it was definitely an exciting situation to say the least! Great fun, can't wait to go again!
